title: Lessons Learned
description: Pink: BoldnessAn expert in the kitchen—and the bedroom—Carlo Franconi was more than willing to teach publicist Juliet Trent the secrets to his success. Juliet never combined business with pleasure... yet she was captivated by Carlo's outrageous boldness and charm. And twenty-one days on tour with the world's sexiest chef was enough to stir any woman's emotions!
author: Nora Roberts
